We refer to Wikipedia articles on computer graphics for help. In this work, the author presents a keypoint-based neural rendering approach called Neural Puppeteer. An example of the encoder slide is shown on the screen, which contains a point cloud with attention mechanisms labeled PointTransformer[1] and AIR-Nets[2], alongside a BN–MLP–BN pathway encoding keypoints into a latent variable z.

Therefore, the answer is (A).

The diagram shown on screen at that time is A: A rendering diagram with a GT RGB-D human on the left and an L_render pipeline on the right, including a highlighted query pixel q and three MLP rendering heads.
